pageContext.claim: “The states need support. Normally they do this themselves, but because of the magnitude of it, the federal government has gotten very much involved in terms of getting the equipment they need. So we're helping them. It's -- it's a responsibility they have, but we are helping the states a lot.”
pageContext.analysis: In any disaster, whether natural or public health, states rely on the federal government for assistance. Several governors of both parties have complained about Trump’s management of the crisis.
